document_data.name: Soul Scour
document_data.mainbody: '''''Soul scour''''' was a [[necromancy]] [[spell]] that allowed the caster to corrupt the soul of another living being on physical contact.
document_data.Effects: Upon casting the spell, the caster's mere touch temporarily drained the essence of any living person or creature. After contact, the mental faculties and individualism of that person were drained from them over the course of a minute.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required the use of a pinch of dust comprising the ground bones of a [[lich]].
